body.note: To split HA across the racks, you can move a controller from Rack 1 to Rack 2 (one controller per rack).
body.p: For additional nodes, you can add up to either:

ul.li: 14 R720xd Storage Nodes or EqualLogic Arrays

body.note: You can use a combination of the two options that does not exceed a total of 20 servers or 30 Us.
